column4: there's either some kind of incompatibility with the pc you're installing it on or the disc isn't right
when i say the disc isn't right i mean, maybe it's not burned right, or maybe it's corrupt, or maybe there's a scratch on it
sometimes there's a prob when you try to burn a cd image onto a DVD, usually it's ok but hey
well, the MD5 sum matched, it appears to be a kernel bug...it just doesn't wanna play nice with the ATI SB600 chip on my motherboard
